text: And as the British Government stepped up the pace of change, so the Africans stepped up their demands. TODAY, in London, that rash and thoughtless policy has caused a crisis - a crisis that never should have happened. No wonder there is doubt and fearful heart-searching. If the Government reverses its plan to give the Africans control in Northern Rhodesia it may indeed face difficulties from African politicians greedy for power.
